Generation IV.Diamond: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee .
Generation IV.Pearl: It does not keep a nest. It flies over fields and mountains in constant search of floral honey.
Generation IV.Platinum: While it loves floral honey, it won't gather any itself. Instead, it plots to steal some from Combee .
Generation IV.HeartGold: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.

Generation V.Black: While it loves floral honey, it won't gather any itself. Instead, it plots to steal some from Combee.
Generation V.White: While it loves floral honey, it won't gather any itself. Instead, it plots to steal some from Combee.
Generation V.Black 2: While it loves floral honey, it won't gather any itself. Instead, it plots to steal some from Combee.
Generation V.White 2: While it loves floral honey, it won't gather any itself. Instead, it plots to steal some from Combee.

Generation VI.X: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.
Generation VI.Y: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It loves the nectar of flowers and steals nectar collected by Combee.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It does not keep a nest. It flies over fields and mountains in constant search of its much-beloved nectar.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Scatters steel-colored scales as it flaps its wings. Despite being observed feeding primarily on the nectar of flowers, Mothim is not often seen around flower gardens.
